jd: From: saurav kumar, applabsystems saurav.kumar@applabsystems.com Reply to: saurav.kumar@applabsystems.com Role : Senior Database developerLocation : Longmont, CO and Sacramento, CA - OnsiteMode:- Contract || Long Term JD :- • Minimum of 13+ years of hands-on experience in SQL Server and MSBI (SSIS/SSAS)• Strong knowledge on writing complex T-Sql queries, Stored procedures, Functions, Triggers and Database objects.• Expertise in Performance Tuning, Database activity automation and Enterprise Reporting solutions.• Write complex queries for applications and business intelligence reporting• Handle common database procedures such as upgrade, backup, recovery, migration, etc• Install and configure SQL server in a server• 4 + years of hands-on experience in SSIS• Experience developing Power BI models and dashboards• Experience in MSSQL and MongoDB is plus• Excellent written and verbal communication skillsThanks and RegardsSaurav Kumar
